images.description: ESO image (superimposed on a DSS image to fill in missing areas) of region near spiral galaxy NGC 1232 and its apparent companion, PGC 11834, also known as NGC 1232A, the pair also being known as Arp 41
Another ESO image of spiral galaxy NGC 1232 and its apparent companion, PGC 11834, also known as NGC 1232A, the pair also being known as Arp 41
ESO image of spiral galaxy NGC 1232
ESO/Chandra composite visual and X-ray image of spiral galaxy NGC 1232 and its apparent companion, PGC 11834, also known as NGC 1232A, the pair also being known as Arp 41
ESO image of spiral galaxy PGC 11834, also known as NGC 1232A, and as part of Arp 41
